title: The Ickabog
author: JK Rowling
text_plain: Here is a snippet of a bit of The Ickabog, which probably involves a young wizard or some ilk casting some magic spells or some nonsense.
text_html: Here is a snippet of a bit of The Ickabog, which probably involves a young wizard or some ilk casting some magic spells or some nonsense.

title: A Visit from St. Nicholas
author: Clement Clarke Moore or Major Henry Livingston, Jr.
text_plain: 'Twas the night before Christmas, when all through the house, Not a creature was stirring, not even a mouse; The stockings were hung by the chimney with care, In hopes that St. Nicholas soon would be there.
text_html:
'Twas the night before Christmas, when all through the house,
Not a creature was stirring, not even a mouse;
The stockings were hung by the chimney with care,
In hopes that St. Nicholas soon would be there.

title: Harder Better Faster Stronger
author: Daft Punk
text_plain: Work it, make it, Do it, makes us, Harder, better, Faster, stronger, More than, hour, Hour, never, Ever, after, Work is, over, Work it, make it, Do it, makes us, Harder, better, Faster, stronger
text_html:
Faster, stronger
Work it, make it
Do it, makes us
Harder, better
Faster, stronger
More than, hour
Hour, never
Ever, after
Work is, over
Work it, make it
Do it, makes us
Harder, better
